MAN.TITLE: connex

DESCRIPTION.P: connex returns the number nc of connected components of graph g and a row vector ncomp giving the number of the connected component for each node. For instance, if i is a node number, ncomp(i) is the number of the connected component to which node number i belongs.

BIBLIO.P: Chartrand, G. "Cut-Vertices and Bridges." §2.4 in Introductory Graph Theory. New York: Dover, pp. 45-49, 1985.
Harary, F. Graph Theory. Reading, MA: Addison-Wesley, 1994.
